====== JCacheStorageMemcache ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCacheStorageMemcache #}

Memcache cache storage handler
===== Methods =====
^ Method ^ Description ^
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-__construct|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-__construct|__construct]] | Constructor |
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-clean|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-clean|clean]] | Clean cache for a group given a mode.<p>group mode		: cleans all cache in the group  notgroup mode	: cleans all cache not in the group</p> |
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-gc|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-gc|gc]] | Garbage collect expired cache data |
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-get|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-get|get]] | Get cached data from memcache by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-remove|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-remove|remove]] | Remove a cached data entry by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-store|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-store|store]] | Store the data to memcache by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageMemcache-test|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageMemcache-test|test]] | Test to see if the cache storage is available. |

----
